description: Independent use of this facility is limited to students studying Fashion Design. The atelier has been designed as a spacious room dedicated to housing essential fashion design equipment and supplies such as papers, fabrics, drawing supplies, paper guillotines, fabric cutters, drawing boards, tracing/design light boxes/boards and more. Designated areas in the room cater to different activities like drawing, sketching, fabric cutting and group brainstorming. Large solid tables at the correct height for pattern cutting are prominently placed in the room, allowing ample space for unrestricted artistic expression. Surrounding these desks are mannequins, comfortable stools, movable mirrors, ensuring an ideal fashion design work environment.
